verses.name: 1 Timothy 6:10
verses.text: For the love of money is the root of all evil: which while some coveted after, they have erred from the faith, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 6:11
verses.text: But thou, O man of God, flee these things; and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, meekness.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 6:12
verses.text: Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, whereunto thou art also called, and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 6:13
verses.text: I give thee charge in the sight of God, who quickeneth all things, and before Christ Jesus, who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession;
